author: serge
msg: Exposes excalibur datasource selector to JAMES block (so mailets can get to database connections defined in james)

author: serge
msg: Have james.bar not include mailet classes (because they will appear in the mailet.jar)

author: danny
msg: New mailet providing configurable redirection for tasks such as forward, forward as attachment, Notify postmaster, Notify sender.

author: serge
msg: Added timeout setting to outgoing mail delivery sockets.  Reported by Stephan Schiessling <s@rapi.com>.  Also added some logging to initializing parameter problems and moved other javax.mail.Session code around to keep centralized.

author: serge
msg: Added matt's patch to fix username and fixed some tags where the attributes were wrong.
